statements: DELETE FROM lobbying_activities WHERE organization = 'Company XYZ';
DELETE FROM lobbying_activities WHERE organization = 'ABC Inc.' AND activity_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting' AND contact_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND interaction_type = 'Meeting';
DELETE FROM lobbyists WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM lobbyists WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM lobbyists ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3);
DELETE FROM influence_monitoring WHERE red_flag = TRUE
